actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill entitled the "Urban Radioactive Materials Protection Act of 1984".

summary.text: Amends the National Environmental Policy Act to require an environmental impact statement from the agency which approves the transportation of radioactive waste materials by highway routing through a standard metropolitan area. Amends the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to direct the Secretary of Transportation to issue new regulations on routing requirements after filing and considering an environmental impact statement and making an environmental and safety assessment of alternative routes for shipment of such materials.

titles.title: A bill entitled the "Urban Radioactive Materials Protection Act of 1984".
